Applications are paper or pdf only, available at the end of the viewing.

If you pass, the deposit becomes the first $100 of your security deposit. If you don't pass, even if your application is processed after the three business days, we return the $100 to you. A cosigner applies in the same way with another $40 application fee. A copy of a passport or driver's license and proof of income is required for each application. Proof of income can be in the form of two recent pay stubs, social security checks, pension, trust fund or support checks, or tax returns.
Note for new international residents: if you don't have a credit history in the U.S. because of your national status, you may be exempt from the credit requirement; however, you will still need to meet the income requirement and will be required to pay an increased security desposit.
All fees and charges, including move in fees, must be in the form of cashier's check or money order, payable to Picardo Arms. Once you are a tenant, from your 2nd month onward, you may pay by personal check.

Sweet 2 bedroom one bath apartment on quiet street, walkable to Ashby BART, Berkeley Bowl (both of them) and an easy ride to Cal. 

The apartment is the upstairs of a 1906 Victorian, with old-time charm, but renovated 4 years ago (new bathroom, floors, some new windows, new skylight, new lights, new refridgerator). Like all properties in Berkeley, this apartment is no smoking.

Rent includes trash and water/sewer. We are a little flexible on move in, but there tenants are moving out on the 15th of April. Super easy on street parking-- although the last several tenants have lived here car-free.
